Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:13W.name: storyboardId
Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:13W.abstract: Identifier used to retrieve the UIViewController from storyboard.

Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:13W.name: init(coder:with:)
Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:13W.abstract: Creates the specified view controller from the storyboard and initializes it using your custom initialization code.

Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html.name: StoryboardLoadable
Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html.abstract: A protocol indicating this a FlowRepresentable that should be loaded from a storyboard.

Extensions/AnyWorkflow.html#/s:8Workflow.abstract: Called when the workflow should be terminated, and the app should return to the point before the workflow was launched

Extensions/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wo.abstract: Called when the current workflow should be terminated, and the app should return to the point before the workflow was launched

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: launchInto(_:args:withLaunchStyle:onFinish:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: When using UIKit this is how you launch a workflow

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: launchInto(_:withLaunchStyle:onFinish:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: When using UIKit this is how you launch a workflow

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: default
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: The default presentation style chosen by the system.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: fullScreen
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: A presentation style in which the presented view covers the screen.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: pageSheet
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: A presentation style that partially covers the underlying content.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: formSheet
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: A presentation style that displays the content centered in the screen.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: currentContext
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: A presentation style where the content is displayed over another view controller’s content.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: custom
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: A custom view presentation style that is managed by a custom presentation controller and one or more custom animator objects.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: overFullScreen
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: A view presentation style in which the presented view covers the screen.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: overCurrentContext
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: A presentation style where the content is displayed over another view controller’s content.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: popover
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: A presentation style where the content is displayed in a popover view.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: automatic
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: The default presentation style chosen by the system.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType..name: navigationStack
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType..abstract: Indicates a FlowRepresentable should be launched in a navigation stack of some kind (For example with UIKit this would use a UINavigationController)

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType..name: init(rawValue:)
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType..abstract: Creates a PresentationType from a LaunchStyle, or returns nil if no mapping exists.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.name: ModalPresentationStyle
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/.abstract: Modal presentation styles available when presenting view controllers.

Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType..name: PresentationType
Extensions/LaunchStyle/PresentationType..abstract: A type indicating how a FlowRepresentable should be presented.

Extensions/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Work.name: hiddenInitially
Extensions/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Work.abstract: Indicates a FlowRepresentable in a Workflow who’s shouldLoad function returns false should be persisted in the workflow for backwards navigation.

Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.name: init(_:launchStyle:)
Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.abstract: Creates a UIKitPresenter that can respond to a Workflow‘s actions.

Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.name: proceed(to:from:)
Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.abstract: Proceeds in the Workflow by presenting the next FlowRepresentable that is also a UIViewController

Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.name: backUp(from:to:)
Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.abstract: Back up in the Workflow by dismissing or popping the FlowRepresentable that is also a UIViewController

Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.name: abandon(_:onFinish:)
Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.abstract: Abandons the Workflow by dismissing all UIViewController‘s currently displayed by this presenter.

Classes/UIWorkflowItem.html.name: UIWorkflowItem
Classes/UIWorkflowItem.html.abstract: UIWorkflowItem: A subclass of UIViewController designed for convenience. This does NOT have to be used, it simply removes some of the overhead that normally comes with a FlowRepresentable.
